Title: Struggle energetically to realize the "Four Modernizations" -- Second of four propaganda posters in commemoration of the 20th anniversary of Chairman Mao's instruction to "organize contingents of people's militia on a big scale"
Designer: Political Department of the Shanxi Provincial Military Region (山西省军区政治部)Propaganda Department of the Shanxi Provincial Communist Party Committee (中共山西省委宣传部)
Notes: Second of four propaganda posters in commemoration of the twentieth anniversary of Chairman Mao's instruction to "organize contingents of the people's militia on a big scale".
